title: The Kids Are Not Alright with Dr. Peter McCullough and Heather Mac Donald
itunes:title: The Kids Are Not Alright with Dr. Peter McCullough and Heather Mac Donald
description:
In a highly in-depth episode of The Charlie Kirk Show, Charlie is joined by Dr. Peter McCullough, author of ‘The Courage to Face Covid-19’ to discuss the horrifying vaccine related injuries and data he’s been uncovering over the past 2 years, and how the medical community and Big Tech is still covering up excess cardiac related deaths—as most recently evidenced by his ban from Twitter. He also welcomes Heather Mac Donald to discuss her recent article in American Mind ‘The Marijuana Myth,’ to explain why Joe Biden's recent pardon of federal marijuana crimes is actually a cover to further the myth that the American justice system is racist, a scheme that could have deadly consequences for our communities.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
